org.jgrapes.core.events

Class Error

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.core.internal.EventBase<T>
      • org.jgrapes.core.Event<java.lang.Void>
        • org.jgrapes.core.events.Error
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Void>, Matchable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HandlingError, IOError

    public class Error
extends Event<java.lang.Void>
    This event signals that an error occurred while processing an event.
    Author:
    Michael N. Lipp

        public Error(Event<?> event,

        Creates a new event.

        message - the message

      • Error

             java.lang.String message,

        Creates a new event caused by the given throwable.

        message - the message
        throwable - the throwable

      • Error

        public Error(Event<?> event,
             java.lang.Throwable throwable)
        Creates a new event caused by the given throwable. The message is initialized from the throwable.
        Parameters:
        event - the event being processed when the problem occurred
        throwable - the throwable

      • getThrowable

        public java.lang.Throwable getThrowable()
        Returns the throwable that caused the problem.
        Returns:
        the throwable or null if the problem wasn't caused by a throwable.
